dimensions.label: Response to Emotions
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin respond when faced with strong emotions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will remain composed and level-headed, even in the face of intense emotional turmoil.
Your FarTwin will allow themselves to fully experience and express emotions, potentially leading to more authentic connections with others.

dimensions.label: Conflict Resolution
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin resolve conflicts with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will fiercely defend their position and assert themselves in conflict, even if it means causing tension.
Your FarTwin will listen actively to others' perspectives and work to find mutually beneficial solutions that respect all parties involved.

dimensions.label: Decision Making Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach decision-making?

options.description: Your FarTwin will rely on logic and data to make informed decisions, weighing pros and cons carefully.
Your FarTwin will trust their instincts and make decisions based on gut feelings or personal values, potentially leading to innovative solutions.

dimensions.label: Social Interactions
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin engage with others in social situations?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be confident and assertive, taking the lead in conversations and social interactions.
Your FarTwin will prefer quieter, more low-key social settings, potentially feeling drained by too much stimulation.

dimensions.label: Risk Tolerance
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach new challenges and risks?

options.description: Your FarTwin will eagerly seek out novel experiences and take calculated risks to push their limits.
Your FarTwin will be more reserved, preferring to weigh the pros and cons before taking a risk or trying something new.

dimensions.label: Work Environment
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin prefer to work?

options.description: Your FarTwin will thrive in team-based environments, enjoying the dynamic and open communication.
Your FarTwin will prefer working alone or in small teams, valuing autonomy and focused time to complete tasks.

dimensions.label: Learning Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach learning new information?

options.description: Your FarTwin will learn best through visual aids, such as diagrams and videos, to understand complex concepts.
Your FarTwin will prefer learning through lectures, discussions, or listening to audio recordings.

dimensions.label: Personal Growth
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin prioritize personal growth?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be driven to constantly improve themselves, pushing beyond their current limits and setting high goals.
Your FarTwin will focus on introspection and self-awareness, using quiet time for personal growth and reflection.
